I find it pretty fascinating that we both kind of came to our beliefs in a reaction sense; reacting to people we thought were trying to force our brains a certain way.

My view so far:

The lie is actually several layers deep; when realizing how "aggressively capitalist" we were I was in the same boat as you; until I realized people like

Russian Infiltrators
Documentary: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T4YtgA2jnu4

&

Communist Zionist schools that fled eastern europe
Documentary:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIdBuK7_g3M

were aggressively pushing the narrative that we were "aggressively capitalist" for many years in the 1900s; producing the hippy-enlightenment movement we see dominating today.

Now if you accept far-left economics to be a form of weakness; then that suggests foreign agents were and are trying to break down the country from the inside via politics.

I see it as; we're led to believe how overly capitalist shit is so that we rise up against it. With the illusion that left economics don't exist politically (which they do); and that all "democrats" are just pushing for "equality" rather than socialism or communism. When in fact; pushing for "equality' is merely the first domino in making people want "economic equality"; and then your social leftism quickly leads to economic leftism.
